caption: A person wearing a breathing mask was seen, while two men were by the riverside. There were many people moving back and forth in a hallway. Several women gathered in the hallway, hugging each other. A woman entered a room where a man was lying on a bed. The man handed the woman a pair of headphones, and she leaned over on the man's bed. At a funeral, many people were dressed in black and holding black umbrellas as heavy rain poured down from the sky. Near a building, several people were carrying boxes up the stairs. A group of women with boxes entered the interior of the building, then left the room.
